dcterms:creator: Andreas Geiger
Philip Lenz
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is a benchmark suite for various tasks in autonomous driving, including stereo, optical flow, visual odometry, and 3D object detection.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: Jonas Uhrig
Nick Schneider
Lukas Schneider
Uwe Franke
Thomas Brox
Andreas Geiger
dcterms:description: This version of the KITTI dataset provides improved ground truth data by using a stereo-reconstruction method to remove outliers in LiDAR points and increase ground truth density.
dcterms:title: KITTI (improved ground truth)

dcterms:creator: David Eigen
Christian Puhrsch
Rob Fergus
dcterms:description: The Eigen split of the KITTI dataset is used for depth map prediction from a single image using a multi-scale deep network.
dcterms:title: KITTI (Eigen split)

dcterms:creator: Zachary Teed
Jia Deng
dcterms:description: This version of the KITTI dataset is specifically used for calculating homography.
dcterms:title: KITTI (for homography calculation)

dcterms:creator: Yi Zhu
Karan Sapra
Fitsum A Reda
Kevin J Shih
Shawn Newsam
Andrew Tao
Bryan Catanzaro
dcterms:description: This version of the KITTI dataset focuses on the semantic class 'road' for improving semantic segmentation via video propagation and label relaxation.
dcterms:title: KITTI (semantic class 'road')
